Question
========
When asking for coding help online, what improves your chances of a useful response?

Answerlist
----------
* Posting a vague complaint without showing code
* Demanding free consulting for a full project
* Including a clear, minimal reproducible example of the problem
* Ignoring previous answers because they're “old”

Solution
========
A concise, reproducible example plus a clear question shows you've done your homework and makes it easy for others to help.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
